messages.content:
PROOFREAD:
Teacher Kaoru is in charge of this school trip. But the mood decayed fast after it became known that she made a mistake on the booking accommodations and tour reservations.

The students then, make her the main attraction.

Teacher Kaoru is in charge of this school trip. However, the mood quickly deteriorated after it was revealed that she had made a mistake in booking accommodations and tour reservations. As a result, the students made her the center of attention.

[ABF-087] My obedient pet candidate 06 - Remu Suzumori

proofread or rewrite:
Remu gets groomed and trained by Sagawa in the fine art of absolute obedience.

Remu is insanely beautiful, even more than usual.

Remu is groomed and trained by Sagawa in the fine art of absolute obedience.

Remu looks stunningly beautiful, even more so than usual.
